All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
BattleshipLogic
Class serves as the logic for the Battleship Game for 2 player Board games.
Board
Class serves as the board for the connect four game The methods are designed to help with the implement of a GUI
BshipAI
GUI Class that creates the game for a Battleship vs.
BShipGOScreen
Game over screen for Battleship Allows user to go back to hub and play a different game or play another round of Battleship Class Implements Action Listener
BshipPlaceP1
This Class is one of two frames for the battleship game contains two phases the placement phase player one and the firing phase for Player two Class Implements Action Listener
BshipPlaceP2
This Class is one of two frames for the battleship game contains two phases the placement phase player one and the firing phase for Player two Class Implements Action Listener
BshipStart
BshiStart is the starting screen for Battleship Allows the user to continue with playing battleship or go back to the hub to play a different game Class Implements Action Listener
C4AI
GUI Class that creates the game for a Connect Four vs.
C4GOScreen
Game over screen for Connect Four Allows user to go back to hub and play a different game or play another round of Connect Four Class Implements Action Listener
C4Start
C4Start is the start screen for Connect Four Allows the user to continue with playing Connect Four or go back to the hub to play a different game Class Implements Action Listener
Connect4GUI
This Class is for the GUI of Connect Four Uses methods from Connect4Logic Implements Action Listener
Connect4Logic
Class serves as the logic for the Connect Four Game for 2 player Board games.
GamePlay
Class serves as the logic for the Connect Four Game AI algorithm The methods are designed to help with the implement of a GUI
HubGUI
The HubGUI class is the class that creates the frame for the selection of games.
Main
This is the Main Class to start the program
MinMax
Class serves as the logic for the Connect Four Game AI algorithm The methods are designed to help with the implement of a GUI
Piece
Class serves as the pieces for the connect four game The methods are designed to help with the implement of a GUI
State
Class serves as the logic for the Connect Four Game AI algorithm The methods are designed to help with the implement of a GUI
